_note: Copy this file to config.json and modify as needed
_listen_port_comment: Port to listen for incoming peer connections (1024-65535)
_max_peers_comment: Maximum number of peers per torrent (1-1000)
_max_download_speed_comment: Max download speed in bytes/sec (0 = unlimited)
_max_upload_speed_comment: Max upload speed in bytes/sec (0 = unlimited)
_sequential_download_comment: Download pieces in sequential order (useful for streaming)
_piece_timeout_comment: Timeout for piece requests in seconds
_seed_ratio_limit_comment: Stop seeding when ratio reaches this value (0 = unlimited)
_seed_time_limit_hours_comment: Stop seeding after this many hours (0 = unlimited)
_tracker_announce_interval_comment: Default tracker announce interval in seconds
_log_level_comment: Logging level: trace, debug, info, warn, error
_log_max_size_comment: Maximum log file size in bytes (5 MB = 5242880)
_log_max_files_comment: Number of rotating log files to keep
_enable_resume_comment: Enable resume capability for interrupted downloads
_enable_dht_comment: Enable DHT for trackerless torrents (not yet implemented)
